Description.val:
This program provides procurement and improvements of navigation equipment to include Inertial Navigation equipment for Ballistic Missile Defense such as gyrocompasses, speed sensors, Electronic Chart Display and Information System - Navy (ECDIS-N) and major components for other navigation systems.  ECDIS-N provides Fleet-wide electronic charting capability, increases navigation and situational awareness, improves safety at sea, and eliminates reliance on paper charts.  These systems provide mission critical navigation data to Ballistic Missile Defense, shipboard, combat, and gun and missile systems.

[P40A / GW054: NAVIGATION TRAINING EQUIPMENT]: Funds are required for the procurement of training equipment for multiple Navigation classrooms in support of Navigation System Technician pipeline maintenance training and ECDIS-N Operator Training.  This includes computer upgrades and software licenses.  These upgrades are critical to maintaining Fleet proficiency on operation and maintenance of navigation systems.  Field Changes include ECDIS-N Operator Course Classroom Tech Refresh and additional seats and licenses and upgrade/update Mariner Skills Simulator (MSS) to support Fleet Training Requirements (Radar/Data bases/Models).

[P40A / GW063:  NAVIGATION CERTIFICATION]: These funds are required for conducting Navigation Certification (NAVCERT) on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms as part of fielded upgrades and tech refresh.

[P40A / GW065: NAVIGATION SHORESITE EQUIPMENT]: These funds are required for the procurement and Non Recurring Engineering (NRE)/ Integrated Logistics Support (ILS)/Support of navigation system shoresite equipment.  Shoresite equipment does not have any associated installation costs.

[P40A / GW066: SSBN NAVIGATION SENSOR OBSOLESCENCE]: These funds are required for Procurement and NRE/ILS/Support of replacement Navigation Sensors on SSBN Platforms.

[P40A / GW068:  NAVIGATION CERTIFICATION SUITE]: These funds are required for the procurement of hardware and software to maintain and upgrade a land-based Navigation Certification Suite lab to verify navigation equipment field changes and tech refresh interoperability with existing systems prior to shipboard installation.

[P40A / GW830:  PRODUCTION ENGINEERING]: These funds are required for the production engineering support of all navigation system hardware, software, and tech refresh procurements and system test and integration.  This Cost Element includes indirect costs associated with the procurement and installation of individual field changes and upgrades.  These costs would include field change and upgrade support, consolidated engineering support, Program Office support, and other costs.  These costs will fluctuate with increases and decreases of overall budget, number and type of field changes and upgrades, and required support.

[P3A / GW036: AN/WSN-7B]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of the AN/WSN-7B Ring Laser Gyrocompass (RLG) for SSN, MCM, and LSD platforms.  System peripherals include Sync Amps, BIT Cables, and installation kits. MCM ships require quantity (2) AN/WSN-7B per ship.  Also, provides funding for part obsolescence solutions to maintain manufacturing capability.

[P3A - 2 / GW051:  ECDIS-N MODERNIZATION]: These funds are for the procurement and installation of ECDIS-N hardware and software Tech Refresh on amphibious, surface and carrier platforms.

[P3A - 3 / GW053: AN/WSN-12]: These funds are for the procurement and installation of AN/WSN-12 Inertial Navigation Systems on surface and submarine platforms.

[P3A - 4 / GW055: SPEED LOGS]: These funds are for the procurement and installation of Speed Log upgrades and Tech Refresh on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.

[P3A - 5 / GW056:  NAVY ECDIS]: These funds are required for the software build, procurement, and installation of Navy ECDIS hardware and software to replace legacy ECDIS-N capability on amphibious and surface platforms.

[P3A - 6 / GW058: NAVSSI CAPSTONE]: These funds are required for the procurement, installation, and NRE/ILS/Support of NAVSSI Capstone upgrades on LHD platforms to support Ship Self Defense System (SSDS) upgrades.

[P3A - 8 / GW060:  NEXT GENERATION FATHOMETER]: These funds are required for the procurement, installation, and NRE/ILS/support of Next Generation Fathometers to replace legacy AN/UQN-4/4A systems on amphibious, surface and carrier platforms.

[P3A - 9 / GW061:  MK 27 REPLACEMENT]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of replacement for legacy MK27 Backup Heading Reference systems on amphibious, surface, and submarine platforms.

[P3A - 10 / GW062:  AN/WSN-7 MODERNIZATION]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of field changes, upgrades, and Tech Refresh of AN/WSN-7 Inertial Navigation System on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.

[P3A - 11 / GW067:  DIGITAL DEPTH DETECTOR]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Digital Depth Detector to replace legacy depth detectors on submarine platforms.

[P3A - 12 / GW069:  BOUNDARY DEFENSE CABINET]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Boundary Defense Cabinets on surface platforms for cyber protection.

[P3A - 13 / GW070:  MILITARY GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM (GPS) USER EQUIPMENT (MGUE)]: These funds are required for the procurement and installation of Military GPS User Equipment on submarine platforms.

Description.val:
These funds are required for the procurement and installation of field changes, upgrades, and Tech Refresh of AN/WSN-7 Inertial Navigation System on amphibious, surface, submarine, and carrier platforms.  

Field Change 21: Technical Insertion (TI-14).  Upgrades include Selective Availability Anti-Spoofing Module (SAASM) GPS Receivers, improved health monitoring, Bathymetric fixes, enhanced networked sensor interfaces, TI-14 IA compliance, and Submarine Warfare Federated Tactical System (SWFTS) Display Standards and Conventions compliance.
Field Change 22: Upgrades include AN/WSN-7 NAV processor firmware Rev-AG and I/O processor firmware Rev-AC.
Field Change 23: Technical Insertion (TI-16).  Improvements include transition from Common Object Request Broker Architecture (CORBA) to Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP).
Field Change 24: Technical Insertion (TI-18) Bathymetric Fix Update.    
Field Change 26: Technical Insertion (TI-20) to be defined in FY20.  
Field Change 28: Technical Insertion (TI-22) to be defined in FY22.  
Submarine Shipalt 4507:  Mounting baseplate modification.
Submarine ECI 14-006 VA:  Enhanced Control Display Unit (ECDU) Shock Mount Mod VME Pin Replacement 
Submarine ECI (TI-10/12/14):  ECDU GVRC, RTP, and WINP firmware upgrades
Submarine ECI (TI-16/APB-17):  ECDU Time Monitoring  
Submarine ECI (TI-18/APB-19):  To be defined in FY19.
Submarine ECI (TI-20/APB-21):  To be defined in FY21.
Submarine TRID TBD (TI-22):  To be defined in FY22.

ECI installation costs may be combined with procurement costs.
